sub-title: As always, partners grows with you!
demo-sub-about-text:
For 25 years, FIBAG Treuhand AG
Laupen competently and reliably for your customers.
Founder and managing partner is Hans Rudolf Blaser,
qualified expert in accounting and
Controlling and approved audit expert RAB.

Before founding FIBAG Treuhand AG Laupen, he acquired extensive knowledge

Know-how in renowned, internationally active
Trust companies in German and
French-speaking Switzerland.
